title: Conversation: James Webb and the American Religious Sounds Project
hero_caption: James Webb. Installation view of Prayer (Johannesburg), 2012. Photo by Anthea Pokroy. © James Webb. Courtesy of blank projects and Galerie Imane Farès
description:
Artist James Webb joins Isaac Weiner and Amy Derogatis, co-founders of the American Religious Sounds Project, in conversation. Following the program, engage with the vocal expressions of spiritual communities in Chicago on the opening evening of the exhibition James Webb: Prayer.

The exhibition opens to the public beginning at 5:00, before this conversation begins. 

*Museum admission is free for Illinois residents every Thursday, 5:00–8:00—including during this event.

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or email access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.

Please see the museum’s Accessibility page for more information.
